mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart (cart_code, customer_id, product_code, cart_amount) VALUES (seq_cart.nextval, #{csId}, #{prCode}, #{cartAmount})
mapper.select: SELELCT C.cart_code, P.product_code, P.product_name, P.product_thumb, C.cart_amount, P.product_price AS prPrice, (product_price * cart_amount) money FROM customer M, product P, cart C WHERE M.customer_id = C.customer_id AND P.product_code = C.product_code AND C.customer_id = #{csId}
